message.content:
cs.CY, cs.SI, cs.IR, cs.DL, cs.SY 

This paper measures synergy in the Russian innovation systems using firm-level data, which involves computational methods and data analysis. Therefore, it is likely to belong to the Computational Engineering, Finance, and Science (cs.CY) category. The paper also uses mutual information to measure synergy, which is a common technique in information retrieval (cs.IR) and machine learning (cs.LG). Additionally, the paper analyzes the geographical distribution of firms and their knowledge bases, which falls under the categories of Social and Information Networks (cs.SI) and Digital Libraries (cs.DL). Finally, the paper discusses the concept of synergy in the context of innovation systems, which is related to the field of Systems and Control (cs.SY).
